version_description:
Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters!

Changes:
• Completed 2016 Offline prayer time database update for Malaysia
• Some bug fix and improvements

We can't interact with you in the app review to solve any problems/bugs occurred so, just tweet or email us at iman@adiman.net and we would love to assist!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters!

Changes:
• Completed 2016 Offline prayer time database update for Malaysia
• Some bug fix and improvements

We can't interact with you in the app review to solve any problems/bugs occurred so, just tweet or email us at iman@adiman.net and we would love to assist!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters!

Changes:
• Data correction for zones in Malaysia (Kuala Terengganu, Marang)

We can't interact with you in the app review to solve any problems/bugs occurred so, just tweet or email us at iman@adiman.net and we would love to assist!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters!

We can't interact with you in the app review to solve any problems/bugs occurred so, just tweet or email us at iman@adiman.net and we would love to assist!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters!

Exciting updates!
• Slightly larger next prayer time widget font. (Pro)
• New color selection interface in settings. It is now sooooooooooo easy to see what color you're selecting! (Pro)
• And we added moreeeeeeeeeeeeeee colors to choose from! @_@ (Pro)
• When translation for Al-Mathurat is turned on, the page is foused on the bottom instead of the top when navigation. It is now fixed! (Pro)
• You are now able to select Al-Mathurat text sizing option (small/medium/large) (Pro)
• Al-Mathurat typo correction on page 31 changed from هَاذَا to هَذَا
• `Next` prayer time widget will now display Shuruq/Sunrise time (Pro)
• Al-Mathurat typo correction from لا هول ولا قوت ال to لا حول ولا قوة الا بالله
• Al-Mathurat typo correction typo correction from لا الاه، to لا الاه،
• iman Pro with Apple Watch!!!!!!!! Check out the Watch App, Glance and Complications! (Pro)
• Some other under the hood improvements

We can't interact with you in the app review to solve any problems/bugs occurred so, just tweet or email us at iman@adiman.net and we would love to assist!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters!

We are glad to announce the long awaited major update for iman App.
Here are the changes:

• Refreshed minimalist user interface
• Background location update! (Still in pilot. But you can use it)
• Duha & Qiyam time
• Apple Health Mindful Minutes tracking
• New Adhan notifications selection
• New prayer time widget
• New extended prayer time widget
• New Daily Dzikr widget
• Full support for all Watch complications

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters!

We are glad to announce the long awaited major update for iman App.
Here are the changes:

• Refreshed minimalist user interface
• Background location update! (Still in pilot. But you can use it)
• Duha & Qiyam time
• Apple Health Mindful Minutes tracking
• New Adhan notifications selection
• New prayer time widget
• New extended prayer time widget
• New Daily Dzikr widget
• Full support for all Watch complications

Attention users with black bar on top and bottom of the app screen, to fix this all you have to do is remove the app and reinstall it again. That should restore a full screen user interface.

Changes:
- fixed default language for locale MY,ID,BN,SG,ELSE
- put back solah correction selection range from 30 minutes until up to 50 minutes (Jomaa Naser)
- updated watch app error message
- fix hijri events bug
- updated daily dzikr font to a regular font
- fixed initial default zone for SG,ID,BN
- minor under the hood improvements
- updated the widget with smaller fonts arrangements
- disabled data hash checking on apple watch
- fixed notifications language to support English, Bahasa Melayu & Bahasa Indonesia when selected in "Solah Name Language"
- watch complications circular small & circular large now using icon instead of solah name (Mohd Firdaus)

Attention users with black bar on top and bottom of the app screen, to fix this all you have to do is remove the app and reinstall it again. That should restore a full screen user interface.

Changes:
- fixed default language for locale MY,ID,BN,SG,ELSE
- put back solah correction selection range from 30 minutes until up to 50 minutes (Jomaa Naser)
- updated watch app error message
- fix hijri events bug
- updated daily dzikr font to a regular font
- fixed initial default zone for SG,ID,BN
- minor under the hood improvements
- updated the widget with smaller fonts arrangements
- disabled data hash checking on apple watch
- fixed notifications language to support English, Bahasa Melayu & Bahasa Indonesia when selected in "Solah Name Language"
- watch complications circular small & circular large now using icon instead of solah name (Mohd Firdaus)

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters,

Here are the changes for this version:
- Bug fixes
- Improved audio quality for almost all azans
- UI fixes
- Suhoor option up to 2 hours before fajr
- Added new method: Generic Fajr 12º Isha 12º
- Added new method: Generic Fajr 15º Isha 15º
- Added new method: Generic Fajr 18º Isha 18º
- Added new method: Generic Fajr 18º Isha 17º
- Added configurable Imsaq time on main UI
- Added Imsa, Duha & Qiyam time on Apple Watch App UI if enabled on iPhone (will not affect complications)

We are sorry for all of the bugs encountered in this fresh new major release. We appreciate your feedbacks and emails. Bear with us as we are working hard to get the best and fixing everything for everyone.

Have a blessed Ramadan Mubarak!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters,

Here are the changes for this version:
- Bug fixes
- Improved audio quality for almost all azans
- UI fixes
- Suhoor option up to 2 hours before fajr
- Added new method: Generic Fajr 12º Isha 12º

- Added new method: Generic Fajr 18º Isha 18º
- Added new method: Generic Fajr 18º Isha 17º

We are sorry for all of the bugs encountered in this fresh new major release. We appreciate your feedbacks and emails. Bear with us as we are working hard to get the best and fixing everything for everyone.

Have a blessed Ramadan Mubarak!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters,
Here are the changes for this version:

New:
• New imsaq notifications - you can now configure imsaq notifications from settings
• New app loading logo
• New fajr azan Ibraheem Jabr Abu Raheq
• New fajr Azan Yaseen Al Aassaf
• Added full azan capabilities when azan time while app is open - Yeah you can now listen to full azan when the app is open
• New compact widget
• Free version now can change body color - For header color & text color, still need locked for Pro

Updates:
• For calculation methods, "High Latitude Rule" now defaults to "Middle Of The Night"
• Updated location tags (app engine improvements)
• Improved azan audio for Ahmad Al Madi
• Increased alpha value for method label
• Replaced Azan Egypt 2 with Ahmed Al Tarablusi
• Replaced Azan Egypt 1 with Abu Hazim
• Replaced Azan Turky 2 with Ahmad Nawaf Al Mejlad
• Replaced Azan Pakistan with Ahmed Al Haddad
• Replaced Azan Syria with Kamal Muhammad Al Marush
• Redesigned iman Pro widget - now with countdown timer! Wohoo
• AppleWatch app improvements - hopefully solves the crashing issue


We are sorry for all of the bugs encountered in this fresh new major release. We appreciate your feedbacks and emails. Bear with us as we are working hard to get the best and fixing everything for everyone. One more, any issue with no notification sound, reinstalling would fix that problem.

Have a blessed Ramadan Mubarak!

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters,

Here are the changes for this version:
Fixes:
• Engine bugfix
• Engine improvements
• Fixed watch app countdown timer bug halt
• Added header title for Mathurat Sughra
• Added azan audio player in adhan - You can now play azan sounds from "Azan menu"
• Fine tune some azan audio
• Added social menu button on main UI
• Removed lat long validation in override GPS
• Fixed bug when "Angle Based" in calculation method did not work
• High Latitude mode is now defaulting to Angle Based for fresh installation
• Another try if this fix resolves the rare Watch App crashing issue

• iOS 13 Dark mode support

• Minor bug fixes

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters

Here are the changes for this version:
• Al-Mathurat will now shift to evening dua after dhuhr, (Nurjalilah Yaakob)
• (iman Pro) Bold 'Next Solah' and countdown timer in the widget (Acik)
• Added new FIANZ - The Federation of the Islamic Associations of New Zealand method (Hanafiah Muhamad)
• Bugfix

Here are the changes for this version:
• (iman Pro) Bahasa Melayu translation for Asmaul Husna & configurable in 'Additional Contents' app settings (Nur Ainal Ismail)
• (iman Pro) Bahasa Melayu translation for Azan & configurable in 'Additional Contents' app settings
• Fixed typo in Al-Mathurat (Fatimah Mohd Fauzi)
• Reverse geocoding now using correct locale to prevent unmatched placemark names
• Lowest supported version is now iOS11
• New feature - Hisnul Muslim
• Lots of under the hood improvement and fixes

Here are the changes for this version:
• Various bugfixes
• Duha time is now configurable to the formula: Shuruq + 1/3 time difference of Shuruq and Fajr or 20 minutes after Shuruq or 28 minutes after Shuruq. For Malaysian zones, will default to 28 minutes after Shuruq based on JAKIM (https://muftiwp.gov.my/falak/soalan-soalan-lazim-falak)
• The long-awaited Siri Shortcuts for iOS 14 (Zul Fazli, Ahmad Ashraf Ilman, Riadh Salem)
• Seven selectable iOS 14 Home Widgets! Yes, seven. iman Pro Home Widget color theme will mirror the parent app. Configure your preferred color scheme to match your home screen wallpaper!

Stay safe everyone!

#BMF

Assalamualaikum brothers and sisters

Here are the changes for this version:
• Important update! We redo the Home Widgets to be configurable and more organized. After installing this update, existing widgets will cease to work. Please remove it and add the widgets again. Contents for each widget family size (small, medium, large) are configurable. Add the widget, tap and hold on it, select the edit widget option to configure what to display. Enjoy!
• Under the hood improvements
• FINAZ (New Zealand) method is now using the database extracted from FIANZ

We thank you for your support. If you like this app, please give us some warm reviews and 5 stars! It would help us a lot

You may also read our privacy policy on our support website and rest assured your personal data is safe as we don't store any user data anywhere

Stay safe everyone!

Here are the changes for this version:
- Fixed bug that crashes the app when using Quran (Kamarulzaman)
- Fixed spelling typo (Red)
- Fixed verse 1:255 Uthmanic text in Zikr (Mipan)
- Tasbih will now resume counter value where you left
- Tasbih counter will now sync with tasbih on Apple Watch vice versa
- iman App will now calculate your age based on the Hijri Calendar year and will wish you on your birthday. Check it out in the app settings
- We've added the Noble Quran with English, Bahasa Melayu & Bahasa Indonesia translation. It stays simple and minimalist as the app intended to be

We thank you for your support. If you like this app, a 5-star review would make our day!

Stay safe everyone!
